description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Red Mullet With Yoghurt Dill Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Red Mullet With Yoghurt Dill Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 red mullet fillets, about 150 g each

recipeInstructions.text: Season the fish fillets, then rub all over with 1 tablespoon of the oil. Cook in griddle pan over a high heat for 5 minutes. Turn over and cook for a further 3-5 minutes until just cooked through.
Meanwhile, mix together the remaining oil, yoghurt, lemon juice, garlic and dill, then season.
Spoon the sauce over the fish and serve with grilled zucchini.
